My FastAPI server crashes when handling multiple concurrent requests.

Necesito filtrar spam y detectar temas interesantes en textos.

Mon conteneur Docker ne peut pas accéder au réseau interne.
Quero gerar documentos PDF a partir de dados estruturados.

How do I stream progress updates from a FastAPI backend?

My FastAPI backend works fine during development, but as soon as I deploy it and start sending multiple concurrent requests from the frontend, the server becomes unstable and sometimes crashes without clear error messages.
I want to set up an automated backup strategy for my home server that runs every night, keeps old backups for a few weeks, and does not require manual intervention once configured.
Estoy trabajando con muchos textos largos y necesito un sistema que pueda filtrar spam, identificar temas interesantes y preparar los datos para un modelo de aprendizaje automático.
I am building a cross-platform desktop application and I would like to bundle a Python runtime so users do not have to install Python themselves on Windows, macOS, or Linux.
Mon conteneur Docker démarre correctement, mais il ne peut pas accéder aux services internes du réseau, même si les autres conteneurs peuvent communiquer entre eux sans problème.
Quero gerar documentos PDF a partir de dados estruturados como JSON ou banco de dados, mantendo os arquivos fáceis de editar e automatizar no futuro.
Warum ist meine SQLite-Datenbank plötzlich gesperrt, obwohl nur ein einzelner Dienst darauf zugreift und vorher alles problemlos funktioniert hat?
I want to add authentication to a small internal tool, but I am worried that OAuth or OpenID Connect might be too complex for such a limited use case.
Voglio migrare da SQLite a PostgreSQL perché l'applicazione sta crescendo e ho bisogno di migliori funzionalità di concorrenza e affidabilità.
I need a way to stream progress updates from a FastAPI backend to a web frontend so users can see what long-running tasks are doing in real time.

So here’s the situation: my FastAPI backend runs fine locally, tests pass, everything looks good. But once I deploy it to the server and connect it to the frontend, requests start timing out. Sometimes I also see random 502 errors in the proxy logs, but not always.

I have a small home server running 24/7. Right now I manually copy files for backups, which is annoying and error-prone. I want something automated, preferably running at night, rotating old backups, and sending me a notification if something fails.

Estoy recopilando muchos textos de distintas fuentes, como RSS, redes sociales y documentos internos. El problema es que hay mucho ruido y spam, y necesito identificar qué temas son realmente interesantes antes de entrenar un modelo.

I’m experimenting with Tauri for a desktop app and I’d like to ship a Python-based backend with it. Ideally users should not even notice Python is involved, regardless of whether they are on Windows, macOS, or Linux.

Mon conteneur Docker démarre sans erreur, mais quand j’essaie d’appeler une API interne, la requête échoue. Les ports semblent ouverts, le firewall est désactivé, et pourtant le service reste inaccessible.
Quero criar documentos como faturas e orçamentos a partir de dados estruturados. No futuro, quero poder mudar o layout facilmente e talvez gerar tanto PDF quanto DOCX.
Warum ist meine SQLite-Datenbank plötzlich gesperrt? Es gibt keine Fehlermeldung außer 'database is locked', und das passiert erst seit ich einen zweiten Hintergrundprozess hinzugefügt habe.
I want to protect a small internal web tool with authentication, but I really don’t want to introduce a full OAuth or SSO setup if a simpler solution would be sufficient.
Voglio spostare la mia applicazione da SQLite a PostgreSQL perché sempre più utenti accedono gleichzeitig, e ho paura di problemi di concorrenza e dati corrotti.
I have a long-running background task in FastAPI that processes text and generates audio. From the frontend perspective, it just looks frozen. I need some way to stream progress or status updates.
